name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

rejectUnauthorized.title: Reject Unauthorized
rejectUnauthorized.description: If the HTTPS agent should check the validity of SSL cert.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.description: Pi-hole base URL, default is http://localhost

path.title: Path
path.description: The directory where the Pi-hole dashboard is located. Typically /api.

time.title: Time
time.description: How long Pi-hole will be disabled, in seconds, default is 0 that means permanently disabled.

reversed.title: Reversed
reversed.description: When set to true reverse the status of Pi-hole. When Pi-hole is Off the plugin will be set to On and when Pi-hole is On the plugin will be set to Off.

logLevel.title: Loging level
logLevel.description: Three different levels: 0: logging disabled, 1: logs only HTTP errors (Default), 2: logs each HTTP response.
